title: Gladiator armor
summaries: Gladiator armor is an armor set consisting of the Gladiator Helmet, the Gladiator Breastplate, and the Gladiator Leggings. Hoplites have a 14.29*1/7 (14.29%) chance to drop a single random piece of the set.
A full set of Gladiator armor provides the following benefits:
